item.title: Saleor
item.description: 关于 saleor 项目 env IP: home, 192.168.31.109 OS: ubuntu, 16.04.03 step FAQ-1 pip install uwsgi==2.0.17时出错: lto1: fatal error: bytecode stream generated with LTO version 6.0 instead of the expected 4.1 见 python-install-uwsgi 一文. FAQ-2 这一小节是一个大大的错误, 可直接看下一小节 export SECRET_KEY='**********' export DATABASE_URL='*********' sudo vi /etc/postgresql/9.6/main/pg_hba.conf ls /etc/init.d/postgresql sudo /etc/init.d/postgresql reload createuser -P -s -e saleor # 报错 createuser -P -s -e saleor -U postgres python manage.py migrate # 报错 which createdb createdb saleorBillions # 报错 createdb saleorBillions -U postgres python manage.
